channel.title: CVE Feed for WPDeveloper -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPDeveloper -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-34764|2024-06-03T11:39:15.881Z -- WPDeveloper -- Essential Addons for Elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Addons for Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Essential Addons for Elementor: from n/a through 5.9.15.

item.title: CVE-2024-31306|2024-04-07T17:42:54.112Z -- WPDeveloper -- Essential Blocks for Gutenberg
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPDeveloper Essential Blocks for Gutenberg allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Essential Blocks for Gutenberg: from n/a through 4.5.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-30226|2024-03-28T04:57:46.257Z -- WPDeveloper -- BetterDocs
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in WPDeveloper BetterDocs.This issue affects BetterDocs: from n/a through 3.3.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-32717|2024-05-09T12:23:16.096Z -- WPDeveloper -- SchedulePress
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPDeveloper SchedulePress.This issue affects SchedulePress: from n/a through 5.0.8.
